import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormGroup, ReactiveFormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reset', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule,ReactiveFormsModule], templateUrl: './reset.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reset.component.scss'] }) export default class ResetComponent { resetForm!:FormGroup reset(){ } }

Reset your password

*Password is required
*Confirm Password is required *Password didn't match
